resources.string: Oops.. There was an error loading the app. Please check your internet connection and restart :)
\"There was an error registering your device to the app, please restart and try again in a few minutes\"
Cannot upload empty quote. Make sense doesn\'t it? :)
An error has occurred, you are not registered to the app\'s main messages channel. That\'s Ok, message can still be displayed.
There are no quotes to display, yet…
Oops, there are network connection problems. Please check your connection and try again
Can\'t access that without network connection, please restart
There was a error refreshing the quotes. Please try again later
There was an error posting the quote, please try again
